DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : REAL_ESTATE
DOC.TEXT: California Home Sales Seen Rising Next Year : Sales of existing , single-family homes_in California should increase 4.5 % in 1995 to 486 # 000 from an expected 465 # 000 in 1994 , according to a forecast by the California Assn . of Realtors . The realty group also predicted that the median state price for a single-family home_in 1995 would increase 1 % to $ 187 # 000 from 1994 ' s projected $ 185 # 100 . The group based its predictions on expected job growth , stable interest_rates and increasing consumer confidence as the state pulls itself out of recession .
